items.sentence: Tom is going to be really tired when he gets home, isn\'t he?
Tom was in a lot of pain when we visited him in the hospital.
Tom was on his way to work when I talked to him this morning.
Tom was reading a newspaper in the lobby when I last saw him.
Tom was waiting over there for you, but I don\'t see him now.
Tom\'s horse got spooked and bolted before he could mount it.
I see what you\'re trying to do, but it isn\'t going to work.
I think that there are a lot of beautiful women in Australia.
I\'ll afraid this kind of meeting isn\'t getting us anywhere.
Tom had been standing in the rain for what seemed like hours.
